properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 10 at 3:27PM CST by NWS Memphis TN
properties.description:
The Flood Warning continues for the Buttahatchie River...Tombigbee
River.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Buttahatchie River near Aberdeen
* until further notice.
* At 2 PM Monday the stage was 14.1 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* Maximum forecast stage of 19.6 feet on Wednesday February 12.
* Flood stage is 13.0 feet.
* The river rose above flood stage Thursday February 6 and will
continue rising to near 19.6 feet by Wednesday February 12.
* At 21.0 feet...Easter Valley Road near the river is flooding and
evacuations of a few homes near the river may be necessary due to
access problems. A significant amount of farm land is flooded.
properties.instruction:
A followup Flood Statement will be issued when conditions warrant.

For graphical river and flood information...please go to
www.weather.gov and click near Memphis on the map, then select Rivers
and Lakes.

Do not drive through flooded areas...turn around don't drown.

Stay tuned to your weather radio and your local news media for the
latest river information.
